role_description: An Ansible role that installs Docker on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Docker](https://www.docker.com/) is a set of platform-as-a-service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers. Containers are isolated from one another and bundle their own software, libraries and configuration files; they can communicate with each other through well-defined channels.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Docker on nearly any platform.
